Title: Is Cancer Hair Loss Permanent?
Summary:
Hair loss is one of the most visible and emotional side effects of cancer treatment. Some people lose all their hair, while others may notice thinning or bald patches. Hair loss can happen on the scalp, eyebrows, eyelashes, and even body hair. For many patients, losing hair is harder than expected.
